title: No-op: Footer copyright name already set to "Sanjay singh Chauhan"
constraints:
Apply any change ONLY to the selected footer bottom-bar

element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[1].
Keep the dynamic current year (currentYear) in the copyright line.
Do not change any other footer content, layout, styles, links, or attribution text.
nonGoals: Do not modify the listing agent name, phone, email, or the disclaimer text.
Do not change any other page sections or global styling.
Do not add backend logic or persistence for this change.
